data.text: @jimmy_dore @YoDoctorYo @aaronjmate @miserablelib On the 'spreadable' 'vaccine'. This is outright chilling. Think of the potential for this to be used to commit outright genocide on billions of people - for example sterilizing everyone on Earth who does not have an antidote, leaving only elites with the ability to have children.

@jimmy_dore @YoDoctorYo @aaronjmate @miserablelib Shouldn't you be pivoting to blaming this on Biden, like your BFF Tucker Carlson has? You're the posterchild for the horseshoe theory and you're too stupid to realize it.
@AndyMcDeeOne @_mrk87 @PinheadKing @jimmy_dore @YoDoctorYo @aaronjmate @miserablelib Dumbest analogy ever. GTFOH Putin puppet.
@AndyMcDeeOne @PinheadKing @jimmy_dore @YoDoctorYo @aaronjmate @miserablelib Antisemitism is far more rampant in Russia than Ukraine. But your attempts at deflection are noted.
@PinheadKing @jimmy_dore @YoDoctorYo @aaronjmate @miserablelib and he comes from a Russian speaking region and household.
@jimmy_dore @YoDoctorYo @aaronjmate @miserablelib Well, you're fairly disgusting. All praise to Putin for you I guess.
@jimmy_dore @YoDoctorYo @aaronjmate @miserablelib Is this going to be posted to view soon or was it only available live?
@jimmy_dore @YoDoctorYo @aaronjmate @miserablelib Jimmy Dore, it must be exhausting trying to justify Putin invading the Ukraine. Hope your check from Russia clears.
